description: This file defines a React functional component named GameScreenDesign that provides a static, visual representation of a game screen layout based on a Figma design. It contains JSX markup with various styled and positioned HTML elements, images, SVGs, and comments describing layout and visual elements. The component is purely presentational with no game logic.

methods.name: GameScreenDesign()
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a static game screen layout based on a Figma design.
